typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	snapshotID as integer
}
source(output(
		{some words} as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> snapshot1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> snapshot2
snapshot1, snapshot2 exists(Prop_1 == Column_1,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		somewords = {some words},
		Prop_1,
		Prop_2,
		Prop_3,
		Prop_4,
		Prop_5
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkparquet
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		{some words},
		Prop_1,
		Prop_2,
		Prop_3,
		Prop_4,
		Prop_5
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> csvsink
